name: Darts Wii DX
overview: Enjoy authentic darts with Darts Wii DX (ダーツWii DX). Grasp the Wii remote by holding the darts arrow and swing the Wii remote toward the screen. You can experience a realistic darts game like throwing darts. The game has five modes: zero one, cricket, cut throat, count up, and rotation. In addition, there is a free throw mode where you can practice freely. Nintendo Wi-Fi connection allows you to participation and browsing of national ranking.
